source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Dreamy Acrylic Landscape Painting
items.headline: Acrylic painting
objectives_summary: How to use a photograph as a reference?
How to observe the colours and block the background?
How to add details to the clouds, trees, mountains ?

items.title: Simplify Your Painting: Paint 5 Watercolor Landscapes
items.headline: Learn how to Sketch and Paint 5 Complex Watercolor Landscapes.
objectives_summary: How to create a simplified pencil sketch from 5 complex reference photographs.
How to paint houses and indicate details with minimal brushstrokes.
How to use tone to imply shadows, contrast and draw attention to certain areas of your painting.

items.title: Paint Vibrant Landscapes In Watercolor
items.headline: Learn how to paint four loose and vibrant landscapes!
objectives_summary: Sketching - how to reduce a photo or scene in front of you down to essentials and pick out elements and objects of focus.
Layering - learn how you only need 2-3 layers in order to complete a watercolor painting.
How to use colour effectively to create areas of interest of portray the mood of a scene.

items.title: How to Paint Modern Acrylic Magnolia- for All levels
items.headline: The Complete Guide to Your First Modern Acrylic Painting
objectives_summary: How to create an abstract floral acrylic painting of magnolia with simple and fun modern techniques
This course is great for all levels, also for for beginners, who want to learn more about acrylic painting
In this class you will learn how to make abstract modern background with acrylics: gold, silver paints and palette knife

items.title: Multiple Layer Resin Method for Upcycling a Pond Table
items.headline: Clay modelling of fish, making a lily from acrylic skins, upcycling painted wooden furniture AND developing resin skills
objectives_summary: How to create depth in resin artwork by using a multiple layer technique
How to create a model fish from clay and how to paint it
How to create a model lily flower and pads from acrylic skins

items.title: How to start with Cricut Design Space from A - Z
items.headline: Includes Cricut Joy, Explore Air 2 and Cricut Maker
objectives_summary: How to use Cricut Design Space Step by Step
Setting up machines
Cricut Joy, Explore Air 2 or Cricut Maker setting up in a breeze

items.title: Crocheting with Plarn
items.headline: Recycling plastic shopping bags into a cute reusable market tote!
objectives_summary: How to crochet with plastic bag yarn

items.title: The Ultimate Hyper-real Drawing with Colored Pen

visible_instructors.job_title: Colored Pencil and Ballpoint Pen Drawing Artist
visible_instructors.name: Matin

items.headline: Sketching and Drawing with Colored Ballpoint pen Step by Step Hyper-real- Realistic Drawing with Colored Pen
objectives_summary: Basic and primary sketching of the lips and cross with pencil
Learn how to hatch in layers
Learn to combine colors in painting with pens

items.title: Basics of Knitting
items.headline: From beginner to advanced - learn how to knit, knitting stitch methods, and make different patterns
objectives_summary: Fundamentals of knitting
What is the difference between knitting and crochet
How to shape by increasing or decreasing loops

items.title: Urban Sketching Essentials: Create Your Own Coloring Books
items.headline: Draw and Paint 8 Urban Landscapes!
objectives_summary: Draw simple to complex buildings with a pen, and how to use watercolor to imply light, shade, and mood with a variety of colors.
Learn how to sketch figures and people.
Learn what paints, paper, brushes, and pens you will need.

items.title: Exotic Birds in Watercolor
items.headline: Easy Watercolor Paintings in a Loose style for Beginners
objectives_summary: Exotic Birds in Watercolor

items.title: DIY Learn concrete art for beginners
items.headline: learn how to make concrete art
objectives_summary: Mixing concrete
concrete work
decorative plastering

items.title: Learn to Draw Mandala Border Designs! | For Beginners!

visible_instructors.title: Swamini Kulkarni
visible_instructors.job_title: Artist, Singer, Graphic Designer and a Youtuber
visible_instructors.name: Swamini

items.headline: Mandala Border Design Online Course By Swamini Kulkarni
objectives_summary: You can draw any kind of Mandala Border Designs
Get rid of your Stressful Life
You can create your own designs of Mandala Borders

items.title: How to Make Soothing and Luxurious Soap at Home Naturally
items.headline: Full Guidelines to make Soothing and Luxurious soap at home naturally
objectives_summary: How to make Soothing Cucumber Soap
How to make a milk soap using Heavy Whipping cream
How to make a milk soap using Heavy Whipping cream

items.title: Palette knife - painting a lush peony impasto

visible_instructors.title: Julia Grechkina
visible_instructors.job_title: Palette knife artist. Impasto technique for the beginners.
visible_instructors.name: Julia

items.headline: Painting peony with a palette knife. 3 easy steps to learn oil impasto for beginners. How to use a palette knife.
objectives_summary: How to choose materials and tools for painting with oils and a palette knife.
How to make a background to be able to apply thick strokes so that it is totally onder control
How to apply thick impasto strokes with a palette knife with 3 ways

items.title: Fundamentals of Watercolours for Beginners and Beyond Part 1
items.headline: This course is primarily for starters in watercolour, and those wishing a refresher course of the basics
objectives_summary: They will be given the first principles of watercolours
How to mix watercolors
Learn how to achieve complementary colours
